import React, {useContext, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import AuthContext from '../../AuthContext' import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' const IndividualPost = ({postInfo}) => { const {state,dispatch} = useContext(AuthContext) const {username,allPosts} = state console.log("postInfo:") console.log(postInfo) return (
{postInfo.content}
Written by:{postInfo.username}
Likes:{postInfo.likes}

    {postInfo.comments.map((sub,idx) =>
  • {sub.commenter == username ? ( editComment({sub})}>edit):null} {editMode && edit_id === sub._id ? () :(
    {sub.content}
    )}
    by: {sub.commenter}
    by: {sub._id}
    Date posted: {formatDate(sub.createdDate)}
    Comment likes: {sub.likes}

    • )}
) } export default withRouter(IndividualPost)
